name: READ: the game
description:
Olivia the Eyeball is on her way to bed soon, as the sun is going down. But she has a lot of trouble getting to bed on time because there are just so many, many good books to read!

Players can achieve different endings depending on how many books they read, and how many concepts (floating words that catch Olivia's eye) they collect.

Made in GameMaker Studio. All art assets, music, writing, and design were done by me; I also did most of the coding, but had a lot of help debugging it with my partner at MirzamGames. :) It's a simple game, but I hope you will enjoy it!

(Created in January 2016)
